long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aboard is powered by amazing AI technology that helps you live your best digital life. Use our Chrome Extension to clean up your tabs, ditch spreadsheets and bookmarks, and organize your stuff in beautiful boards.
